Workspace/Article/Document UI Updates. Adjustments to the User interface for the Workspace environment to enforce more UI consistency, especially for the Article and Documents parts.
New RSS module for aggregating, reading and archiving RSS/Atom feeds from other web sites.
New DWR module that integrates the Direct Web Remoting project for easier AJAX development, working easily with bridging server-side Java objects with JavaScript.
New Web 2.0 Module. Module that conveniently bundles all the main AJAX JavaScript libraries (Scriptaculous, Prototype etc.) into the ePlatform.
Updated image module now shipped with the platform. Handles auto-resizing and thumb nailing of uploaded images through WebDAV/Slide.

Full JSF Component support in Builder. Builder now supports adding pure JSF components (not PresentationObjects) with the “Add Module” window in Builder into IBXML pages. Previously in version 3.0 this was limited to manually editing xml tags for these components. This makes it easier to work with the Article module that is based on pure JSF components. This is built on new ComponentRegistry framework that scans and holds a registry of all available faces-config.xml files installed in jar files in the running application.
Basic JUnit Tests. Simple automated Unit test case for the core module and base classes for developing new unit tests easier in existing idegaWeb maven modules.

Locale variants implemented (sub-locale). Possibility to have variations on translations under each locale (language). This is implemented as additional Localized_[variantx].strings file and can be used to implement customer specific localizations.
Myfaces runtime update to 1.1.3. Update to the most recent Myfaces JSF runtime (core) and Tomahawk addon module.
New Cache sub-system. IWCacheManager2, which builds on the Open source ehCache project.
Caching support for rendered content general general JSF UIComponents (Content Caching). Builds on the IWCacheManager2.
IDO Persistence framework updates. Updates to facilitate usage of caching of entity beans and better control of pre-loading large collection of beans from finder methods.
Performance optimizations and caching implemented for core module beans (ICObject,ICObjectInstance,ICLocale).
Added experimental support for the H2 (http://www.h2database.com/) database engine.
Misc. updates to unify look-and-feel of UI components (IWAdminWindow) and adjusting to newer ePlatform look.
Adding inclusion of LogDriver standard with the system.
Misc. other small bugfixes.
